content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Production System at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0)
- Input chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5)

### Secondary Iron Production System at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Input chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 5268, 5276)
- Electric network covering multiple poles (id 9310)

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt systems for material transport

### Research Lab System
- Lab with automation science pack research in progress
- Connected to power network 9310

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Cannot extract items from chests that don't contain the specified items
- Verify item availability in source chest before attempting extraction

### Power System Issues
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to prevent power outages
- Keep coal supply consistent to maintain power generation

### Production Line Issues
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels) for automation science pack production
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all burner devices (mining drills, inserters)

### Inventory Management
- Keep track of critical resources (coal, copper plates) and replenish before completely depleting
- Maintain buffer stocks of essential materials in storage chests

### Entity Placement
- Multiple unused pipe groups and belt groups indicate potential inefficient layout
- Consider optimizing layout to reduce unused infrastructure
